City data.  Plot out the big cities.  Then cluster them.

```{r}
BigCities <- WorldCities %>%
  arrange( desc(population) ) %>%
  head( 2000 ) 
ggplot( data=BigCities, aes(x=longitude, y=latitude)) +
  geom_point()
```

Cluster them ...
```{r}
clusts <- BigCities %>% 
  select( longitude, latitude ) %>% 
  Mclust( data=., G=1:7)
plot( clusts, what="classification" )
```
